pr_title: Add a documentation link of example requests for DebugPage

timeline.message:
Add a documentation link of example requests for DebugPage

Motivation:

Some users might not know that they can specify example requests or headers for DebugPage.
Related: #2690

Modifications:

- Add a tip to the top of Debug console

Result:
More user friendly.

timeline.bodyText:
They use a different version scheme for lab.
https://material-ui.com/components/about-the-lab/
timeline.author: ikhoon
